reviewText: This DVD is not the special it claims to be in the advertisement.  It's actually the recap a year later.  It's very short, and not a full story at all. I am considering attempting to get a refund.  Do not buy this.
If I would have known that this video was only an hour I would not have spent the money. I thought it was several episodes of 20/20 on one video. It was informative but not worth the money.
